title: Deals: Samsung Galaxy Buds Pro hit $140, HP Chromebook Amazon lows, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are headlined by Samsung’s Galaxy Buds Pro at $140. That’s alongside an Amazon low on the HP Chromebook 14b and TP-Link’s latest Assistant outdoor smart plugs from $15. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Samsung Galaxy Buds Pro hit $140, HP Chromebook Amazon lows, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung Galaxy Buds Pro discount at Amazon takes 30% off the ANC earbuds alongside HP Chromebooks and more on sale today.
